cboCostEstimates.description: As ordered reported by the House Committee on Veterans’ Affairs on July 28, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4625, VA Caregiver Transparency Act

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. BERGMAN:
H.R. 4625.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article One, Section Eight of the United States
Constitution
[Page H3845]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

title: VA Caregiver Transparency Act
